name: Subject 43
description:
You have 43 subjects available.

Each new subject will adapt to the dangers faced by the previous dead subject by developing skills to surpass the challenges that the previous one failed to.

Sacrifices will be needed in order to develop your capacities.

Please, lead this experiment with caution.

USE A and D to move. | J to use skill | R to reset skills

Team:
  • Ian Doles (Game Designer/Composer/Sound Designer)
  • Paulo Viking (Programmer/Animator)
  • Paulo Lorde (2D Artist [Character Artist])
  • Camila Fiorentini (2D Artist [Level Artist])
